name: Ants of Jam: Justice Unleashed
description:
Ants of Jam: JUSTICE UNLEASHED

Exterminate the invading ants! They want your jelly, but they can't have it!

First pick your side, blue or red, then get ready to battle to the death for that sweet, sticky justice.

CONTROLS:

Move: Left click or WASD                     

Shoot: Right click

Change formation: 1 (circle) and 2 (line)

Change spacing: Space

Toggle zoom: Tab

Full screen: F11

Written in Go using Ebiten.

Created by husband/ wife team. 
Art by: tulipsarenice
